domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical

text: @JudgeJeanine For-profit corporate media, ALL OF IT.  There is no fair and unbiased objectivism when the bottom line is money.  The 'news' is nothing more than political pablum pandered to the populous with the greatest advertising revenue.  COVID19 has brought out the worst of the bad.
